page.title: 16A Saturday Afternoon
page.content: After lunch I usually go into Dartford with my Mum and Dad or with my friend. If I go with Mum and Dad we go in the car, and I leave them in Dartford and meet up later; if I go with my friend we go on the bus. I look around the shops and I might spend my pocket money, which is Â£l.5O per week. I usually go into a cafe for a drink and play on the machines. If I am meeting my Mum and Dad we meet up at about four thirty outside MacDonald's and we go in for our tea. I have a big Mac and chips and a big Coke. Sometimes you get a toy car which Mac Donald's are giving away free. We get home for about six o'clock and I watch television until bedtime. Not very interesting, is it?
